title: Liam Payne and actress Rebecca Ferguson accused by One Show viewers of 'flirting big time'

Viewers of The One Show have called out Liam Payne and actress Rebecca Ferguson for flirting when they appeared on the evening show on Friday.

Liam, 26, was on the sofa to talk about his new music and Rebecca was promoting her new film Doctor Sleep - the sequel to 1980 thriller The Shining - but it was their fiery chemistry that caught viewers attention.

During their time chatting to hosts Marvin Humes and Angellica Bell viewers were unable to deny how well the singer and actress were getting along and accused them of 'flirting.'

Rebecca appeared to get giddy when a photoshopped snap was shown of Liam as a cast member of Peaky Blinders - following him admitting he had hopes to become an actor and was previously close to scooping up a role on the hit drama series.

In response, the elegant beauty giggled as she said: "Ooh you are such a thespian! You are everywhere."

This was followed by Liam getting up to perform his new single Stack It Up after Rebecca playfully slapped his thigh.

(Image: BBC)

The Swedish star then was seen on camera nuzzling her face into her shoulder as she gazed at Liam - who was unable to wipe the smile of his face.

Fans of the BBC magazine series took to Twitter to share their thoughts on the pairs behavior.

One wrote: "Rebecca Ferguson flirting BIG time with Liam Payne on the one show.

@LiamPayne #oneshow."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Another added: "Omg Rebecca Ferguson could not be trying harder with Liam Payne right now #oneshow."

Others contributed: "#rebeccaferguson - a devastating flirt ... with Liam Payne on #theoneshow and bit cringey."

"What a shame. Liam going to prepare has had to halt the flirting so obviously going on."

A Twitter user joked: "Liam's done a runner then #TheOneShow."

(Image: Getty Images)

Some viewers responded to the claims by reminding fans how Rebecca is married with Ludwig Hallberg.

A loyal fan typed on the micro-blogging site: "Anyone who’s seen more than 3 Rebecca interviews knows she’s naturally flirty with literally everyone."

"Stop thinking Rebecca Ferguson is trying to flirt with Liam Payne or anyone else, that’s literally just her personality with everyone and she’s married like leave her alone," told another.

Liam shares a son Bear with former Girls Aloud star Cheryl, 36, who he split from in 2018.

The Strip That Down hitmaker is now dating model Maya Henry.
description: The One Direction star, 26, and actress, 35, appeared on the BBC show together to promote their most recent projects
